Sampled at the Oud Beersel cafÃ©.  This Lambic is served in the traditional manner, completely flat (no CO2 at all) from the tap.  The Lambic served here was most likely a young version.  The beer had some reddish notes to it, unlike the Gueuze, which was much more of a gold color.  The smell did not smell as sour as I had expected.
